Text: Can anyone verify that this is or is not unabridged?  The novel clocks in at about 400 pages; 5 30minute mp3 files seems to reflect that it is abridged to me.

This torrent is a radio drama, not the audiobook. Other torrents for the audiobook are waaaaaaaaay slow. The best place to get it is here: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/6804117/The_Top_100_Sci-Fi_Audiobooks___(51-75)
